title: A Beautiful Now
text:
A Beautiful Now is a 2015 American comedy-drama film written and directed by <a href="Daniela%20Amavia">Daniela Amavia</a> and starring <a href="Abigail%20Spencer">Abigail Spencer</a>. It is Amavia's directorial debut.
Plot Summary.
A beautiful dancer balances on the razor's edge between reality and fantasy as she asks her friends to help her figure out the passions and relationship that have shaped who they are and who they will become.
Reception.
Keith Watson of "<a href="Slant%20Magazine">Slant Magazine</a>" awarded the film one and a half stars out of four.
